recipe.name: Vegetable Soup
recipe.ingredients: 125 grams carrot (2 medium carrots), cut in 2-inch chunks 70 grams celery (about 2 stalks), cut in 2-inch chunks 170 grams onion (1 medium onion) peeled and cut into eight pieces Kernels from 2 ears corn or 1 can (15.25 ounces) of corn, drained 1 teaspoon salt 1 teaspoon sage 1/2 teaspoon thyme 1 quart chicken or vegetable stock 1/2 cup tomato juice 1 tablespoon lime juice

step.describe: Scrape down the bowl. Add the celery
Scrape down the bowl. Add the onion.
Scrape down, then add the remaining ingredients.
Serve hot. Add cooked pasta or rice, if desired.
